title: Wicked Warden
description: He’s the only man my father can trust when the cartel attempts to take us out. A vicious motorcycle gang member, he’s deadly with his fists and firearms.He’s also the bastard responsible for my mother’s death.I’m the one who’ll make him pay. A too-young, too-innocent woman he lusts after but refuses to touch.He might believe he’s strong enough to withstand my plans for retaliation, but I will bring him to his knees and have my revenge.Even if my heart dies along with his.
author: Lynn Burke
